Description:
Detects POST requests to the F5 BIG-IP iControl Rest API "bash" endpoint, which allows the execution of commands on the BIG-IP

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Thurein Oo
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: F5 BIG-IP iControl Rest API Command Execution - Proxy
Query: eql select * from _source_ where cs-method = 'post' and c-uri like '%/mgmt/tm/util/bash'
